meanings.definition: The quality or state of being transparent.
meanings.sent1: The transparences of the glass allowed us to see through it easily.
meanings.sent2: The transparences of the plastic wrap made it easy to view the contents inside.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick relied on the transparences of the crystal ball to deceive the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her honesty was like the transparences of a crystal-clear lake, revealing everything beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The transparences of the ice sculpture created a stunning visual effect at the party.

meanings.definition: The ability to see through something clearly.
meanings.sent1: The transparences of the window allowed us to see outside without any obstruction.
meanings.sent2: The transparences of the water in the lake made the fish visible from above.
meanings.sent3: The detective's keen eye for transparences helped him solve the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was like the transparences of a crystal ball, seeing through people's intentions effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The transparences of the glass sculpture captivated visitors with its intricate details.

meanings.definition: The clearness or lucidity of something.
meanings.sent1: The transparences of her explanation made the complex topic easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The transparences of the diamond's cut enhanced its brilliance under the light.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's humor had a certain transparences that made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His sincerity shone through with the transparences of his words, touching everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The transparences of the artist's vision was evident in every stroke of the painting.
